result.execSummary:
The defendant Sadrach H Acevedo Davalos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sadrach H Acevedo Davalos

records.addlTxt: Pretrial Incarceration Credit form filed.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Sadrach H Acevedo Davalos in court with attorney Adam Galaviz.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called for jury status hearing.  Defense is prepared to enter a change of plea at this time.  State filed an amended information.  Defense acknowledges reciept of amended information, waives further reading and enters guilty pleas.  Court conducts plea colloquy.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Counts 1 and 2.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Case 17CM492 dismissed and read in to this matter.  Recommendations by the State.  Arguments by the Defense.  Statements by the Defendant.

The Court Orders the Following:

Count 1:
Imposed and Stayed Sentence of:
9 Months Huber with STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - CONCURRENT with Count 2.  (Credit - 40 days).

Term of Probation: 18 Months Probation
Conditions of Probation:
-	Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
-            Follow any conditions imposed by Agent;
-	No contact with victim listed in criminal complaint.
-	No further law violations.
-	Anger management counseling to be determined by Agent.  
-	Defendant is not to possess any firearms.
-	Write apology letter to victim listed in criminal complaint.

Condition Time: 90 days Huber with  NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - CONCURRENT with Condition time in Count 2 and in 18CF936 - STAYED to be used at the Agents discretion

Restitution: to be determined.

COSTS:  $253.00; cash bail from this matter and from 17CM492 to be applied.  Any remaining cash bail to be refunded to poster.

DNA Surcharge: $200.00; cash bail from this matter and from 17CM492 to be applied.  Any remaining cash bail to be refunded to poster.

DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 


Count 2:
Imposed and Stayed Sentence of:
9 Months Huber with STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - CONCURRENT with Count 1.  (Credit - 40 days).

Term of Probation: 18 Months Probation
Conditions of Probation:
-	Same as Count 1

Condition Time: 90 days Huber with  NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - CONCURRENT with Condition time in Count 1 and in 18CF936 - STAYED to be used at the Agents discretion

Restitution: to be determined.

COSTS:  $253.00; cash bail from this matter and from 17CM492 to be applied.  Any remaining cash bail to be refunded to poster.
